attributes.action: WASTE Mattresses, carpet & black rubber seals. Send to Europe for incineration.
attributes.additional_details: Carpet, mattresses & pvc windows must all become carbon neutral in order to protect the planet that we all live on.
attributes.background: Mattresses, carpet & pvc windows are very labour intensive to make. Consequently they are labour intensive to recycle. The only option is incineration in Europe.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition asking to ban the sale of particular products, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
